title: Guess the Video Game Food! - Game Showdown
description:
Blessing got bit by a snake. So Roger carries the show and asks them all about Food in Video Games! Season 2 Ep. 10

Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set.

Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up your copy of Portillo the Wiener Dog Thinks He’s a Manatee and the new line of Portillo merch!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:46 - First Question & Housekeeping
00:04:26 - Round Robbin’
00:19:16 - GeoBlessr
00:29:05 - Mad Categoriez
